sentences: Ma ei tea, kus ta elab kusagile.
context: The Estonian word 'kusagile' is an adverb that means 'somewhere' or 'to someplace'. It is formed from the root word 'kus' (where) with the suffix '-agi' (also/too/even) and the case ending '-le' (allative/dative case indicating direction or destination). The allative case indicates movement toward a location. This word expresses an unspecified, unknown, or unimportant location.
